entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is sitting in the room with Professor Trelawney. He seems to be concerned about her health.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a teacher who appears to be having some sort of seizure or fit. She speaks in a harsh voice, unlike her usual self.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a powerful and evil being who has been abandoned by his followers. He will rise again with the aid of his servant.

entities.name: the servant
entities.description: The servant is a person who has been chained for twelve years and will break free tonight to rejoin his master, the Dark Lord.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Professor Trelawney's health and seems to be worried that she might have a seizure.
The servant will break free tonight to rejoin his master, the Dark Lord.
